play() - Static method in class LadderAndSnake
The play method is a static method which initiates the core engine of the game where players start to play the game
playerNumber - Variable in class LadderAndSnake
A variable which stores the the player number (order)
playerPosition - Variable in class LadderAndSnake
A variable which keeps track of the player's position on the game board
playerRoll - Variable in class LadderAndSnake
A variable which stores the number rolled by the player dice
PlayLadderAndSnake - Class in <Unnamed>
The PlayLadderAndSnake class is a driver class which contains the main method where the game program is supposed to be launched from
